title: The app works pretty well, but...
body:
The app is working pretty well so far, the only "complains" I have off the top of my head are the lack of a search bar when starting a conversation with a friend and in the friendlist, and the friend speech bubble is maybe too dark and blends with the background

Other than that, good work! It's simple, responsive doesn't weight too much and it's not FB messenger :^]

Hope to see many updates soon!

EDIT: WHOOPS! I just saw the search bar on top of the friend list, it was kinda conceiled tho :O

replies.body:
Glad you found it! 

For anyone else wondering, you can pull down on the friend list or when starting a chat from the + button to reveal the filter bar. Also, you can filter by summoner name or buddy note! We wanted it to be out of your way normally, but still there if you need it. :D
All in all it's a great idea, maybe a little hint to show it the first time would be cool!
